items.text: Hard hat and safety glasses available
items.details: Ensure hard hats and safety glasses are available and worn where required so that personnel are protected from head and eye hazards on site.
Keep access paths to the work area clear and signed so that personnel can enter and exit safely and emergency egress is not blocked.
Verify the first aid kit is stocked and accessible so that minor injuries can be treated promptly and the kit is ready for emergencies.
Identify trip hazards (cables, tools, uneven surfaces) and mitigate them so that personnel can move through the area safely.
Ensure emergency exits and egress routes are unobstructed so that everyone can evacuate quickly and safely in an emergency.
Confirm a fire extinguisher is present, visible, and within its inspection date so that a small fire can be suppressed quickly if needed.
